ovdesc.p: Program to view the customer accounts together with update codes and dates for the BGC.

desc.p: Contains the update code for the processing which took place on the associated date.
1 indicates new account. 2 indicates details updated. 3 indicates account closure. 4 indicates account reopened.
1 numeric character. Associated multi sub valued fields, associated with DATE. Updated externally only.
Contains account ids of the customer whose updates may be processed via the BGC.
Must be a valid account id of a category specified as BGC.
Refers to the customer record whose static updates are to be reported to the BGC.
Must be a valid ID to the customer record.
Contains the date from the BGC tape that the changes were recorded.
Multi sub valued field associated with field UPDATE.CODE. Updated externally only.
